options.name: Critical Success
options.description: When you Overcraft, you produce double the amount of Ammunition

options.name: Trajectory Analysis
options.description: Gain Additional [Heavy +3 / Light +2 / Ultra Light +1] Range on Ranged Weapons

options.name: Ammunition Specialist
options.description: Gain +1 Ammocraft and +1 Damage to Ranged Weapons

options.name: Free Action : Pass Through
options.description: When you shoot a piece of your Ammunition, you turn it into a Line Attack that deals full Damage to the first target hit, and half to every other target it passes through.

options.name: Volatile Ammunition
options.description: Your Shrapnel and Exploding Ammunition deals an extra dice of Damage

options.name: Packed Ammunition
options.description: The Radius on Ammunition Infusions that cause Area effects is increased by 1 Unit

options.name: Improved Ammunition Chamber
options.description: You can apply an Ammunition Chamber Infusion to a Weapon that has already been Crafted without requiring an Infusion Slot by making an Ammocraft Check of 10 or Higher.

options.name: Armor Negation
options.description: Armor Piercing Ammunition created by you bypasses Physical Mitigation Completely.

options.name: Potion Lobber
options.description: Your Delivery Ammunition does not have a Penalty to the Required Check to avoid it and the Range is extend to the Maximum Range of a Weapon.

options.name: Expert Ammocrafter
options.description: Gain +2 Ammocraft and +1 Damage to Ranged Weapons

options.name: Improved Utility
options.description: When you create Ammunition with the Shrapnel, Explosive or Smokescreen Infusions, the initial Projectile now deals Damage like a normal Ranged Attack if you hit a Creature.

options.name: Action : Ammosurge
options.description: You prepare 4 Ammunition which are all consumed by this Action. You fire 1d4 times ignoring any Ammunition Capacity property and do not apply your Bonus Damage Modifier to any of the hits.

options.name: Master Ammocrafter
options.description: Gain +2 Ammocraft. Your Shrapnel and Explosive Ammo add your Ammocraft Skill at the time of Crafting to their Splash Damage. Additionally, the execution threshold on your Executioner Infusion is doubled.
